cast.name: 范吉利斯·穆里基斯 Vangelis Mourikis
玛丽莉塔·兰布罗普洛 Marilita Lambropoulou
米纳斯·哈茨萨瓦斯 Minas Hatzisavvas

writer.name: 尼科斯·帕纳尤托普洛斯 Nikos Panayotopoulos

introduction: A 35-year old man, just released from jail, decides to make a clean break from the big city and his troubled past. He retreats to the abandoned village his father came from and moves into an old, collapsing house. Alone, far from the bigger village and doing petty jobs to survive, he will strive to find himself once more. Amidst a haze of suspicion and scorn by villagers who treat him an intruder, his past catches up to him in the form of his girlfriend from Athens. Conflict is inescapable...
